Venice e5 生理人 Antonio 看見伊e5親友 Bassanio ai3 beh去 Belmont 求婚ti7一個真好額，尚且真sui2 e5小姐名叫 Portia，有欠用錢項，心肝真艱苦，不止同情伊，總是tu2-tng7伊本身無現金，所以有去ka7伊平時不止厭惡，hit個放重利e5猶太人，叫做 Shylock ，beh ka7伊借3000 Ducat來hou7伊。總是這個 Shylock 常常bat hou7 chiah e5 Christian侮辱，蹧踏伊、罵伊放重利；所以心底真無歡喜，chhe7機會beh ka7 in報冤仇。真tu2好，tu2-tng7 Antonio來beh ka7伊借3000 Ducat，伊隨時答應伊，講伊無beh ka7伊提重e5利息，kan-ta著立契約寫明，若是過期限e5時，著將伊身軀e5肉一斤來做kho-liau7 。

Venice e5 seng-li2 lang5 Antonio khoaN3-kiN3 i e5 chhin-iu2 Bassanio ai3 beh khi3 Belmont kiu5-hun ti7 chit8 e5 chin ho2-giah8, siong7-chhiaN2 chin sui2 e5 sio2-chia2 mia5 kio3 Portia, u7 khiam3-eng7 chiN5-hang7, sim-koaN chin kan-khou2, put-chi2 tong5-cheng5 i, chong2-si7 tu2-tng7 i pun2-sin bo5 hian7-kim, sou2-i2 u7 khi3 ka7 i peng5-si5 put-chi2 iam3-oN3, hit e5 pang3 tang7-lai7 e5 Iu5-thai3 lang5, kio3-choe3 Shylock, beh ka7 i chioh 3000 Ducat lai5 hou7 i. Chong2-si7 chit e5 Shylock siong5-siong5 bat hou7 chiah e5 Christian bu2-jiok8, chau-that i, ma7 i pang3 tang7-lai7; sou2-i2 sim-toe2 chin bo5 hoaN-hi2, chhe7 ki-hoe7 beh ka7 in po3 oan-siu5. Chin tu2-ho2, tu2-tng7 Antonio lai5 beh ka7 i chioh 3000 Ducat, i sui5-si5 tah-eng3 i, kong2 i bo5 beh ka7 i theh8 tang7 e5 li7-sek, kan-ta tioh8 lip8 khoe3-iok sia2 beng5, na7 si7 ke3 ki5-han7 e5 si5, tioh8 chiong i seng-khu e5 bah chit8 kun lai5 choe3 kho-liau7.

後來 Bassanio 求婚ti7 Portia e5小姐e5事，得著成功，續成婚，也siang7 hit時伊e5朋友 Gratiano 也 kap Nerissa 結婚。大家teh歡喜e5中間，忽然收著 Antonio e5批講：伊e5商船有摃破，有tu2著破產e5運命，尚且tui3 Shylock 借hit條債務也滿期，boe7得thang還，所以Shylock有訴訟ti7法庭，要求beh取伊身軀一斤e5肉。Bassanio 為著beh救伊e5親友 Antonio，就趕緊轉去Venice。伊e5某 Portia 心內也有扑算e5所在，就假裝男子，稱做 Padua e5 Bellario博士e5 代理；帶 Nerissa 假做伊e5書記，也趕緊起身去Venice e5 法庭，Portia用甚物奇智來救伊e5丈夫e5親友Antonio。Ti7這場真出名e5場面，就是Venice e5法庭teh-beh來解決。這齣猶原是英國e5文豪Shakespeare作--e5。

Au7-lai5 Bassanio kiu5-hun ti7 Portia e5 sio2-chia2 e5 su7, tit tioh8 seng5-kong, soa3 seng5-hun, ia7 siang7 hit-si5 i e5 peng5-iu2 Gratiano ia7 kap Nerissa kiat-hun. Tai7-ke teh hoaN-hi2 e5 tiong-kan, hut-jian5 siu tioh8 Antonio e5 phoe kong2: I e5 siong-chun5 u7 kong3 phoa3, u7 tu2 tioh8 pho3-san2 e5 un7-beng7, siong7-chhiaN2 tui3 Shylock chioh hit tiau5 che3-bu7 ia7 boan2-ki5, boe7-tit-thang heng5, sou2-i2 Shylock u7 sou3-siong7 ti7 hoat-teng5, iau3-kiu5 beh chhu2 i seng-khu chit8 kun e5 bah. I e5 bou2 Portia sim-lai7 ia7 u7 phah-sng3 e5 sou2-chai7, chiu7 ka2-chong lam5-chu2, chheng choe3 Padua e5 Bellario phok-su7 e5 tai7-li2; toa3 Nerissa ke2-choe3 i e5 su-ki3, ia7 koaN2-kin2 khi2-sin khi3 Venice e5 hoat-teng5, Portia eng7 sim2-mih8 ki5-ti3 lai5 kiu3 i e5 tiong7-hu e5 chhin-iu2 Antonio.
